translation.en: Sharkboy was not always half-shark, half-boy.
translation.ja: “シャークボーイ”は昔 半魚人ではなく―

translation.en: He was a marine biologist, or at least in training.
translation.ja: 見習い生の海洋生物学者だった

translation.en: His father studied great white sharks...
translation.ja: シロザメ研究家の父親は―

translation.en: ...and called his son "Sharkboy"...
translation.ja: サメへの偉大な愛ゆえ―

translation.en: ...because of how much he loved to care for sharks.
translation.ja: 息子を”シャークボーイ”と名付けた

translation.en: He made them sushi and had given them all names.
translation.ja: 彼はサメに寿司を与え名前をつけた

translation.en: Good Milk, Piggy, Egg Battle and Kraken.
translation.ja: グッドミルク ピギーエッグ･バトル クラーケン

translation.en: But one day, an incredible, mysterious storm appeared.
translation.ja: そんなある日謎の竜巻が起こり―

translation.en: It swept away the entire laboratory.
translation.ja: 研究所を吹き飛ばした

translation.en: -Sharkboy! -Thanks to the life rafts...
translation.ja: シャークボーイ！ 救命ボートのおかげで―

translation.en: -...Sharkboy and his father survived. -Sharkboy!
translation.ja: 親子は助かったが― シャークボーイ！

translation.en: But they survived on different sides of the wreckage...
translation.ja: 互いに反対方向へ流され―

translation.en: ...each floating off in a different direction.
translation.ja: 二人はバラバラに

translation.en: Sharkboy!
translation.ja: 息子よ！

translation.en: Sharkboy was completely alone.
translation.ja: シャークボーイは独りぼっちに

translation.en: Almost completely.
translation.ja: そんな時だった

translation.en: But one of the sharks recognized him.
translation.ja: サメの一匹が彼に気付いた

translation.en: Hey. It's Sharkboy.
translation.ja: シャークボーイだ

translation.en: Don't take a bite out of him, boys. He's a friend.
translation.ja: 食うんじゃないぞオレの友達だ

translation.en: They took Sharkboy to their cave home, where he'd be safe and dry.
translation.ja: サメは彼を安全な洞窟へ連れて帰った

translation.en: His new family were sharks.
translation.ja: サメが新しい家族になったのだ

translation.en: Hundreds of sharks.
translation.ja: 何百匹ものサメの群れで―

translation.en: The sharks raised him as one of their own...
translation.ja: サメの子として育てられ―

translation.en: ...training him in the ways of the shark.
translation.ja: サメ流のしつけで教育

translation.en: You must keep moving to survive.
translation.ja: 生き伸びるには―

translation.en: Always go forward, never back.
translation.ja: 前進あるのみ　振り返るな

translation.en: To live by instinct, and instinct alone.
translation.ja: 頼りになるのは自分の本能だけ

translation.en: Eventually, he grew gills and sharp talons for claws.
translation.ja: ついに 彼の体はエラが発達してツメも成長

translation.en: His teeth sharpened themselves to a point.
translation.ja: 歯はキバのようにとがり―

translation.en: He grew fins. All sorts of fins.
translation.ja: ヒレというヒレはすべて生えた

translation.en: But that was years ago.
translation.ja: でも それは昔の話

translation.en: I first met Sharkboy while fishing on a dock this summer.
translation.ja: 僕が彼に初めて出会ったのは今年の夏

translation.en: He seemed lost.
translation.ja: 迷子みたいだった

translation.en: -You have to get a real job. -No, I have a job.
translation.ja: ちゃんと働いて 働いてるさ

translation.en: So I snuck him home...
translation.ja: だから 連れ帰って―

translation.en: -I can't stand the writing process. -Maybe you should leave.
translation.ja: 何が執筆活動よ 不満なら出ていけ

translation.en: ...when my parents were too busy to notice.
translation.ja: 気付かない両親を尻目に―

translation.en: I kept him fed and in water.
translation.ja: 彼をかくまうことにした

translation.en: He had been traveling the universe in search of his father.
translation.ja: 父親を捜して宇宙を旅しているという

translation.en: He told me of his latest adventures on a planet so cool...
translation.ja: 彼の冒険話は楽しすぎて―

translation.en: ...it makes you drool.
translation.ja: よだれが出そうだった

translation.en: He said I, too, could go to Planet Drool someday.
translation.ja: 僕もよだれ惑星に行けるらしい

translation.en: Then one night, I was visited by a glowing light.
translation.ja: ある夜 部屋がまぶしい光に包まれた

translation.en: An amazing girl with purple flames for hair...
translation.ja: 現れたのは燃えるような赤髪と―

translation.en: ...and skin of molten lava rock appeared.
translation.ja: マグマ色の肌の女の子

translation.en: I called her Lavagirl.
translation.ja: 僕は彼女をマグマガールと呼んだ

translation.en: She smiled at me, for that seemed to be her name.
translation.ja: 彼女は気に入ったように微笑むと―

translation.en: She told me she needed Sharkboy to return to Planet Drool with her...
translation.ja: シャークボーイを連れ戻すと言った

translation.en: ...for a great crisis was developing.
translation.ja: 惑星に危機が迫っていた

translation.en: She asked if I could go with them.
translation.ja: 僕も誘われたけど―

translation.en: I told her, "I have school tomorrow."
translation.ja: 明日学校があると話した

translation.en: She gave me a sad look and flamed away...
translation.ja: 彼女は悲しそうに消えて行った

translation.en: ...taking Sharkboy with her.
translation.ja: シャークボーイと一緒に

translation.en: I haven't seen Sharkboy or Lavagirl since then.
translation.ja: それ以来 二人の姿を見ていない

translation.en: And that's what I did this summer.
translation.ja: それが夏の思い出です

translation.en: Enough.
translation.ja: やめなさい！

translation.en: Someone is picking that up. And it's not gonna be me.
translation.ja: 紙くずは自分たちで拾うんだぞ

translation.en: We were supposed to tell true stories.
translation.ja: 発表は作り話だと思います

translation.en: That is a true story.
translation.ja: 本当の話だ

translation.en: -Does Lavagirl have special powers? -There's no such thing as Lavagirl.
translation.ja: マグマガールの能力は？ そんな物いない

translation.en: She can--
translation.ja: 彼女は...

translation.en: -She can shoot lava out of her hands. -Cool.
translation.ja: 手からマグマを発射できる クールね

translation.en: How many people think Max's story is true?
translation.ja: マックスの話を信じる人は？

translation.en: -Not true. -Made-up.
translation.ja: ウソだ 作り話

translation.en: -Not true. -It's just a made-up story.
translation.ja: ウソだろ ただの空想さ

translation.en: If it's true, why don't you bring Sharkboy...
translation.ja: 本当なら 明日授業に―

translation.en: -...and Lavagirl to class tomorrow? -They went away.
translation.ja: 二人を連れて来て 消えたんだ

translation.en: -I don't know where they went. -Have a seat, Max.
translation.ja: 居場所を知らない 座りなさい

translation.en: Linus, you're next.
translation.ja: 次はライナスの番だ

translation.en: This summer, I met a new friend...
translation.ja: 夏は友達ができた

translation.en: ...who was half-dork, half-boy.
translation.ja: 半分マヌケ(ドーク)な男の子

translation.en: I called him Dorkboy.
translation.ja: マヌケボーイと名付けた

translation.en: His real name was Max.
translation.ja: 本名はマックス

translation.en: We had him for dinner, but he stunk so bad that we all blew chunks.
translation.ja: 夕食に誘ったけど彼の悪臭で みんなゲロ騒ぎ

translation.en: That's enough, Linus.
translation.ja: もういい

translation.en: Linus, Max, stay.
translation.ja: ライナスとマックスは残って

translation.en: -Come on, Mr. E. -Class, what's my name?
translation.ja: エレ先生ってば みんな　私の名前は？

translation.en: Mr. Electricidad.
translation.ja: エレクトリシダッド先生

translation.en: Mr. Electricidad, exactly.
translation.ja: エレクトリシダッドだな

translation.en: Not "Mr. Electric." Not "Mr. Electrici...."
translation.ja: エレクトリックでもエレなんとかでもない

translation.en: Linus, you just earned a minus for your behavior today.
translation.ja: ライナス今日の行動はマイナス評価だ

translation.en: This is a new year. Do you think you can be friends?
translation.ja: 新学年なんだぞ仲良くしろ

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.ja: イヤです

translation.en: Then it's decided, you'll be the best of friends.
translation.ja: 決まりだ　親友になること

translation.en: Which means no more picking on Max, Linus.
translation.ja: 二人とも お互いいがみ合いはナシだ

translation.en: Max, you're in the fourth grade.
translation.ja: マックス君はもう4年生だ

translation.en: There are good kids in this class.
translation.ja: 友達を作って

translation.en: Find them, make friends with them.
translation.ja: クラスには いい子もいる

translation.en: Dreaming keeps you from seeing what's right here in front of you.
translation.ja: 夢を見るのは現実から目をそらすことだ

translation.en: This isn't a dream. This is the real world.
translation.ja: 君が生きてるのは現実の世界なんだよ

translation.en: -I lost my train of thought. -No dreaming. Got it.
translation.ja: 何の話だったかな？ “夢を見ない”でしょ

translation.en: -I'll try harder. -What do you have there?
translation.ja: 頑張ってみます 何を書いてる？

translation.en: It's my dream journal.
translation.ja: 夢日記です

translation.en: It has all of my most precious dreams in it.
translation.ja: 僕の夢が詰まってる

translation.en: And I'll never part with it for as long as I live.
translation.ja: 生きている限り手放しません

translation.en: You're a good kid, Max.
translation.ja: 君はいい子だ

translation.en: Max.
translation.ja: マックス！

translation.en: Let's be imaginary friends.
translation.ja: 友達ごっこしようぜ

translation.en: You can try and hang with us, and we'll pretend you don't exist.
translation.ja: 一緒に遊んでもいいけどお前は透明人間

translation.en: Check it out. Sharkboy gets shocked by electric eels...
translation.ja: シャークボーイはエレキうなぎに感電

translation.en: ...and then they feed on his cooked flesh.
translation.ja: 丸焦げになって食われたってさ

translation.en: Wow, Linus.
translation.ja: ライナス

translation.en: Your skills are weak.
translation.ja: 君の絵は下手クソだ

translation.en: I'm gonna burst your bubble, dream boy.
translation.ja: 夢をブチ壊してやるよ

translation.en: You're dead.
translation.ja: 潰してやる

translation.en: Get the book!
translation.ja: 日記を奪え！

translation.en: Give me the book.
translation.ja: オレによこせ

translation.en: Hand over the book, or you'll visit the dream world.
translation.ja: さもないと夢の世界に送ってやる

translation.en: All right. We got it.
translation.ja: よし　取ったぞ

translation.en: I'll bring you a revised edition tomorrow.
translation.ja: 明日 手直しして持ってきてやる

translation.en: -Max, wake up. -Dream, Max.
translation.ja: マックス！　起きろ 夢を見るの

translation.en: -Open your eyes, Max. -Eyes open and dream.
translation.ja: 目を開けろ 目を開けて 夢を見て

translation.en: -Stay dreaming. -Wake up!
translation.ja: 夢を見続けるんだ 起きて！

translation.en: Sharkboy...
translation.ja: シャークボーイ…

translation.en: ...and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: マグマガールも

translation.en: Max?
translation.ja: マックス？

translation.en: My cookies. My giant cookies.
translation.ja: せっかくのクッキーが

translation.en: What are you doing baking sweets?
translation.ja: 何でお菓子作りなんか

translation.en: You know what happens when he eats sugar.
translation.ja: 息子には禁物だ

translation.en: I baked them for his class.
translation.ja: クラスの子にと

translation.en: So you could make friends at school, and now you've eaten them.
translation.ja: 友達にあげる前に食べたのね

translation.en: No. It was Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: シャークボーイだよ

translation.en: Look. This one has shark bites, and this one is singed.
translation.ja: 見て　サメの歯形だこっちは焦げてる

translation.en: There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: そんな子達はいないわ

translation.en: Well, I believe him.
translation.ja: オレは信じる

translation.en: Your mother's right.
translation.ja: ママは正しい

translation.en: When you go to sleep and close your eyes, they may come back.
translation.ja: 寝てる間に現れるかもしれんが―

translation.en: When you open them again, Sharkgirl and Lavaboy will be:
translation.ja: 目を覚ますとシャークガールは―

translation.en: -Out of here. -But--
translation.ja: 消えてる でも…

translation.en: Mouth closed. Eyes closed.
translation.ja: 目と口を閉じて

translation.en: -Now? -Yes, now.
translation.ja: 今？ そうよ

translation.en: You can wait till you're in bed to close your eyes.
translation.ja: ベッドに入ってからでいいわ

translation.en: Kids need their dreams.
translation.ja: 子供には夢が必要だろ

translation.en: Kids need to grow up.
translation.ja: 子供は成長しなきゃ

translation.en: He's not making any friends with these cookies.
translation.ja: こんな味じゃ友達も逃げるぞ

translation.en: There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: そんな子達はいないって

translation.en: There's no such thing as Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: シャークボーイもマグマガールも

translation.en: Yes, there is.
translation.ja: いるんだよ

translation.en: Stupid plugs.
translation.ja: 使えないプラグだな

translation.en: Please don't let me have to go to school.
translation.ja: 学校なんか行きたくない

translation.en: They'll make fun of me. I know it.
translation.ja: 僕のこと笑い者にして

translation.en: I wish I could just escape this loser world and go to Planet Drool.
translation.ja: 負け組の世界を飛び出してよだれ惑星に行けたら

translation.en: Games and toys and laughs and fun.
translation.ja: ゲーム おもちゃ楽しいことだらけ

translation.en: May there be terrible storms...
translation.ja: 嵐にならないかな

translation.en: ...rain, sleet, snow, tornados...
translation.ja: 雨 みぞれ 雪それに竜巻！

translation.en: ...so I can lay here all day tomorrow...
translation.ja: そしたら 一日中ベッドで―

translation.en: ...and dream of Drool.
translation.ja: 惑星の夢を見られる

translation.en: Guess I didn't dream hard enough.
translation.ja: 思いが足りなかったかな

translation.en: There are good opportunities out there. You just need to look.
translation.ja: いい求人があるわこれ見て

translation.en: Traffic engineer.
translation.ja: 交通技術者だって

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: なあ

translation.en: I was cleaning out my closet, look what I found.
translation.ja: クローゼットから出てきた

translation.en: Remember Tobor, the robot you tried to build?
translation.ja: お前が作りかけのトッボロ

translation.en: Why were you cleaning out your closet?
translation.ja: クローゼットから？

translation.en: I had to find one of these.
translation.ja: これを探してたんだ

translation.en: -Is Mom making you get a real job? -Writing is a real job.
translation.ja: ママが仕事探しを？ 執筆は立派な仕事だ

translation.en: -When it pays. -I'm walking you to school today.
translation.ja: 金になれば 学校まで歩くわよ

translation.en: So, what do you say? Wanna finish making Tobor?
translation.ja: どうだ？コイツを完成させてやるか？

translation.en: -It won't work. -Well, how do you know?
translation.ja: 動かないよ なぜ わかる？

translation.en: Because you told me it wouldn't.
translation.ja: パパが言った

translation.en: I did?
translation.ja: そうだった？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: -I should've never said that. -It's okay. You were right.
translation.ja: そんな軽々しく言って パパの言う通りだよ

translation.en: Dumb idea.
translation.ja: 動くわけない

translation.en: How did this happen?
translation.ja: これは何かしら

translation.en: The grass was dead anyway.
translation.ja: どうせ枯れてた

translation.en: Why are you so morbid?
translation.ja: 元気がないわね

translation.en: I just wish anything could happen so I wouldn't have to go to school today.
translation.ja: 学校を休めるような事件が起きればいい

translation.en: That's not realistic, Max.
translation.ja: そんなの非現実的よ

translation.en: It's bad enough your father's head is in the clouds, but not you too. Okay?
translation.ja: 夢を追うなんてパパだけで十分

translation.en: Just push that dream aside and move on.
translation.ja: 現実を見て 前へ進むわよ

translation.en: Like with your dream?
translation.ja: それがママの夢？

translation.en: The one about you and Dad and me?
translation.ja: ママとパパと僕の夢は？

translation.en: Well, I do have a dream about us...
translation.ja: 家族の夢はあるわ

translation.en: ...but as I'm sure you've been noticing lately, your father and I are just....
translation.ja: でも 気付いてると思うけど私とパパは最近…

translation.en: Well, we're...
translation.ja: その…

translation.en: ...not compatible.
translation.ja: かみ合わないの

translation.en: Sorry, I don't mean to dump this on you right before you go to school, but--
translation.ja: ごめんね学校に行く前に こんな話を

translation.en: School's waiting.
translation.ja: 授業が始まるわ

translation.en: Did we have to move so close to school?
translation.ja: なぜ 学校の正面の家に？

translation.en: Your father thought we'd save money on gas.
translation.ja: ガソリン代の節約なの

translation.en: Come right home after school today...
translation.ja: 帰りは寄り道せずに

translation.en: ...because there's some things we need to talk about.
translation.ja: 家族で話があるから

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してるわ

translation.en: I wish anything could happen so I wouldn't have to come home today.
translation.ja: 家に帰れないような事件が起きないかな

translation.en: Hey, look. It's dream boy.
translation.ja: おい　ドリームボーイだ

translation.en: Who knows where tornados come from?
translation.ja: 竜巻は なぜ起きる？

translation.en: Well, when cold air mixes with hot air, it can form a tornado.
translation.ja: 冷気と暖気がぶつかった衝撃で起こる

translation.en: As the hot and cold chase each other around and around and around.
translation.ja: 互いが追いかけ回って渦を作るのさ

translation.en: I dreamt of a story kind of like Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: シャークボーイたちの夢を見ました

translation.en: Ice Girl and Dream Boy.
translation.ja: 氷の王女と夢見る少年

translation.en: Her powers come from her Crystal Heart.
translation.ja: クリスタルハートを操るの

translation.en: -No more fairy tales. -Piranha Girl and Beluga Boy.
translation.ja: おとぎ話はよせ ピラニアガールよ

translation.en: Plastic Boy and Metal Girl.
translation.ja: メタルガールは？

translation.en: Barf Boy and Vomit Girl.
translation.ja: ゲロボーイとか

translation.en: Does everyone hear me? I'm a teacher, right?
translation.ja: 話を聞きなさい私は先生だ

translation.en: Wrong. I'm an awakener.
translation.ja: いや　目覚まし係だな

translation.en: Only I'm finding it more and more difficult to keep my class awake.
translation.ja: 生徒を起こしておくのがこんなに難しいとは

translation.en: No recess again for you, Marissa. Too many allergies.
translation.ja: 遊びは終わりだまた花粉か

translation.en: Got more boogers on your homework than there is homework.
translation.ja: 休み時間も勉強すること

translation.en: I'm just cold.
translation.ja: 寒いだけよ

translation.en: I'll be happy to change places with you.
translation.ja: 席を変わるよ

translation.en: -It's a lot warmer back in my spot. -But I have to sit up front.
translation.ja: 後ろのほうが暖かい でも 前に座らないと

translation.en: It's just that you're sitting right under the vent.
translation.ja: エアコンの真下だよ

translation.en: -And it's August and you're sneezing. -You're gonna get me in trouble.
translation.ja: 8月なのに くしゃみを 放っておいて

translation.en: Max.
translation.ja: マックス

translation.en: Are you trying to make real friends?
translation.ja: 仲良しの子を作ろうと？

translation.en: Yeah. Trying like you told me to.
translation.ja: 先生の言うとおりに

translation.en: That's good.
translation.ja: それは良い

translation.en: Just not with my daughter, okay?
translation.ja: だが 私の娘はよせ

translation.en: -No. It wasn't like that. It's just-- -Sit down, Max.
translation.ja: いえ　そういうわけでは… 席に戻りなさい

translation.en: -Give me back my journal. -Class has begun. Everyone, sit.
translation.ja: 日記を返せ 授業を始めるぞ

translation.en: -Linus took my journal. -I did not.
translation.ja: ライナスが日記を 盗ってない！

translation.en: Minus. I mean Linus.
translation.ja: マイナス　いやライナス

translation.en: You get a minus for misconduct. Give Max back his journal.
translation.ja: マックスに日記を返しなさい

translation.en: One more time, Linus, and we'll have to change your name to "Minus."
translation.ja: もう一度やれば“マイナス”と呼ぶぞ

translation.en: -He ruined my dream journal! -I did not.
translation.ja: 日記に落書きが！ やってない

translation.en: Mr. Electric, send him to the principal's office...
translation.ja: 先生彼を校長室に呼んで―

translation.en: ...and have him expelled!
translation.ja: 退学処分に！

translation.en: You're in my class, not the other way around.
translation.ja: 私の授業だ調子に乗るな

translation.en: I know everything, and you know nothing.
translation.ja: 先生は私だ何の知識もないクセに

translation.en: At the end of class, both of you will report to the principal's office...
translation.ja: お前たち二人は授業の後 校長室に来い

translation.en: ...with your parents.
translation.ja: 両親と一緒に

translation.en: Everybody down!
translation.ja: みんな伏せろ！

translation.en: It's them.
translation.ja: 彼らだわ

translation.en: I'm looking for Max.
translation.ja: マックスはどこなの

translation.en: She's hot.
translation.ja: ホットだぜ

translation.en: We need your help, Max. Come with us.
translation.ja: あなたが必要よ一緒に来て

translation.en: What do I have to do?
translation.ja: どこに行くの？

translation.en: Go with us to Planet Drool. We'll explain on the way.
translation.ja: よだれ惑星へ　説明は後よ

translation.en: We're going to Planet Drool?
translation.ja: それって どこにあるの？

translation.en: It's my home planet, just outside our solar system.
translation.ja: 私の故郷太陽系の外なの

translation.en: You should know, Max. You made it up.
translation.ja: マックスあなたが創り出したのよ

translation.en: -I can't go with you. -Why not?
translation.ja: 行けないよ どうして？

translation.en: Because you're not real. Both of you are just a dream.
translation.ja: 君達は現実にはいない夢の中の存在だ

translation.en: And when I open my eyes...
translation.ja: 目を覚ませば…

translation.en: ...you'll be gone.
translation.ja: 消えるんだ

translation.en: We're still here, Max.
translation.ja: まだいるわ

translation.en: If you wanna stop the Darkness from destroying our worlds...
translation.ja: 世界を蝕む”闇”を食い止めたいなら―

translation.en: ...come with us.
translation.ja: 一緒に来てくれ

translation.en: You better go with them.
translation.ja: 行った方がいい

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: わかった

translation.en: I'll go.
translation.ja: 行くよ

translation.en: Everyone follow me. We're gonna go find shelter.
translation.ja: シェルターに避難するぞ

translation.en: I can't believe I'm finally getting to ditch this place...
translation.ja: まさか 学校をサボって―

translation.en: ...and go to Planet Drool.
translation.ja: よだれ惑星に行くなんて

translation.en: How are we getting there?
translation.ja: どうやって行くんだ？

translation.en: Put these on, everybody.
translation.ja: ゴーグルをつけて

translation.en: Blue goggles for the boys, pink for the girls.
translation.ja: ブルーは男の子ピンクは女の子よ

translation.en: Do you have another pair of boy goggles?
translation.ja: まだブルーある？

translation.en: So how do you fly it?
translation.ja: どうやって飛ぶんだ？

translation.en: You don't know?
translation.ja: 知らないの？

translation.en: That's sort of been the whole problem.
translation.ja: それが問題なんだよ

translation.en: You press "Go."
translation.ja: 押して

translation.en: -Now how do you fly it? -It's got an autopilot.
translation.ja: どう操縦するんだ？ 自動操縦になんだ

translation.en: You thought of everything, didn't you, Max?
translation.ja: 抜け目ないのね

translation.en: Not exactly.
translation.ja: そうでもない

translation.en: -How do we land it? -That's the part I never thought of.
translation.ja: 着陸はどうする？ それは 考えてなかった

translation.en: Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune.
translation.ja: 木星 土星 海王星

translation.en: You might wanna hold on to something.
translation.ja: つかまって

translation.en: -Recognize your dream world, Max? -Not really.
translation.ja: 夢を思い出した？ いや

translation.en: I feel like I should, but I just don't.
translation.ja: うまく実感がわかないよ

translation.en: It's affecting him too.
translation.ja: 彼にも影響が

translation.en: I thought he would just remember.
translation.ja: 覚えてると思ったの

translation.en: -Remember what? -Your dreams. This planet?
translation.ja: 何をって？ 君の夢さ　この惑星のこと

translation.en: Us.
translation.ja: 俺達のこと

translation.en: Your powers.
translation.ja: 君のパワーのことも

translation.en: -I have powers? -More than any of us.
translation.ja: 僕に力が？ 誰よりも強いパワーよ

translation.en: Don't you know that?
translation.ja: 知らなかった？

translation.en: Everything that is or was began with a dream.
translation.ja: すべては夢見ることから始まるの

translation.en: And you dreamt us, Max.
translation.ja: あなたが創ったの

translation.en: -Us and this whole place. -I did?
translation.ja: 私達も この惑星も全部 僕が？

translation.en: Every dream you ever had landed right here on Planet Drool.
translation.ja: 君の夢見た物が全部ここにある

translation.en: -Why is it so dark? -The planet is dying.
translation.ja: 空が真っ暗だ 星が滅びそうなの

translation.en: It began yesterday.
translation.ja: 昨日からよ

translation.en: What's the calculation, Sharkboy?
translation.ja: 残り時間は？

translation.en: Forty-five minutes till the Darkness destroys Planet Drool.
translation.ja: 闇が惑星を飲み込むまであと45分

translation.en: We didn't go to Earth to save you, Max.
translation.ja: 惑星を救ってほしいの

translation.en: We need you to save Planet Drool.
translation.ja: そのために連れて来た

translation.en: But how?
translation.ja: どうやって？

translation.en: The Dream Lair is on the other side of the planet.
translation.ja: 夢の巣が惑星の反対側に

translation.en: That's where your dreams are going bad.
translation.ja: 悪夢の根源だ

translation.en: We have to go there and reverse it.
translation.ja: それを作り変える

translation.en: We have to travel through the Passage of Time...
translation.ja: 時空の回廊(かいろう)を抜け―

translation.en: ...catch the Train of Thought, swim down the Stream of Consciousness...
translation.ja: 思考の列車に乗って意識の河を泳ぐ

translation.en: ...and skate across the Sea of Confusion, now covered in ice.
translation.ja: 凍った混迷の海の上を滑っていく

translation.en: Why'd you do that, Max? Why'd you freeze the ocean?
translation.ja: なぜ 惑星をこんな風にしたんだ？

translation.en: Max didn't mean to do it. Did you, Max? Max is a good boy.
translation.ja: そんなつもりはなかった彼はいい子よ

translation.en: Otherwise, you and I would be evil, and we're not evil.
translation.ja: 彼を責めるなら私達は悪魔よ

translation.en: I'm not evil, am I, Max?
translation.ja: そうじゃないでしょ？

translation.en: I don't-- I don't think so.
translation.ja: その… 違うと思う

translation.en: That's why we brought you here. To put things back in order.
translation.ja: すべてを元に戻して

translation.en: We just have to stay positive. It's not the end of the world.
translation.ja: 前向きに世界は終わってない

translation.en: Not yet, it's not.
translation.ja: そう　まだな

translation.en: The Darkness. Run!
translation.ja: 闇だ　逃げろ！

translation.en: This is like a bad dream.
translation.ja: まるで悪夢だ

translation.en: Oh, yeah? Just wait till you meet Mr. Electric.
translation.ja: エレキ魔王よりマシだぜ

translation.en: He's the worst bad dream yet.
translation.ja: ヤツは悪魔そのものだ

translation.en: Where is everyone?
translation.ja: 他の人達はどこ？

translation.en: -They're trapped on Mount Neverest. -By Mr. Electric.
translation.ja: ネバーレスト山よ 閉じ込められてる

translation.en: But Planet Drool is a place for kids to dream and have endless fun.
translation.ja: 子供の夢と冒険が詰まった惑星でしょ

translation.en: It's endless fun, all right.
translation.ja: 冒険か　そうだな

translation.en: Once you get on...
translation.ja: 一度乗ったら―

translation.en: ...you can't get off.
translation.ja: 降りられない

translation.en: Kids aren't allowed to rest, because if they rest, they sleep.
translation.ja: 休めないの眠ってしまうから

translation.en: And if they sleep, they dream, and if they dream--
translation.ja: もし眠って 夢を見たら―

translation.en: It takes power away from Mr. Electric.
translation.ja: 夢は魔王の力を奪う

translation.en: But we're gonna stop him with our secret weapon.
translation.ja: 秘密兵器で 彼を止めなきゃ

translation.en: Shouldn't we save those kids first?
translation.ja: まず 彼らを助けなきゃ

translation.en: Why can't I do that?
translation.ja: なぜ 僕は力がないんだ

translation.en: Lavagirl!
translation.ja: マグマガールだ！

translation.en: Who knows where Mr. Electric is hiding?
translation.ja: 魔王のアジトを知ってる人？

translation.en: Everyone?
translation.ja: 全員？

translation.en: They're not raising their hands. You're all upside down.
translation.ja: 手を挙げてるんじゃない逆さまになってる

translation.en: Who is stopping my unstoppable coasters?
translation.ja: ジェットコースターを止めたのは誰だ

translation.en: -Back in your seats. -Go. Run. Hide!
translation.ja: 席に戻れ 走って！　逃げるの

translation.en: -Let's get out of here. -Everyone back in your seats.
translation.ja: ここから出よう 全員席に戻れ

translation.en: Who's Mr. Electric?
translation.ja: エレキ魔王の正体は？

translation.en: He's supposed to provide light to the planet...
translation.ja: 惑星の電気係だったの

translation.en: ...but all he brings now is Darkness.
translation.ja: 今は闇を送り込んでる

translation.en: The fun has begun.
translation.ja: 冒険の始まりだ

translation.en: He's taking us up.
translation.ja: 上に昇ってる

translation.en: My home. At half its normal power.
translation.ja: 私の家よパワーが半減してる

translation.en: He's taking us down.
translation.ja: 落ちてるぞ

translation.en: Showtime.
translation.ja: ショータイムだ

translation.en: Keep playing. Never stop.
translation.ja: 休むな　遊び続けろ

translation.en: Games and toys and laughs-- Hey. Hey.
translation.ja: ゲームにおもちゃに…ほらほら

translation.en: Hey. Hey. And fun.
translation.ja: 楽しいことだらけ

translation.en: Well, well, well. If it isn't Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: シャークボーイとマグマガールじゃないか

translation.en: What are you doing halting my endless fun-coaster...
translation.ja: 私のコースターを止めて―

translation.en: ...and infiltrating my lair?
translation.ja: アジトに潜入するとはな

translation.en: We don't need permission from you.
translation.ja: 許可は必要ない

translation.en: Fiery.
translation.ja: アツいね

translation.en: I don't believe we've met. I'm Mr. Electric.
translation.ja: お前は初対面だな私がエレキ魔王だ

translation.en: Why are you bringing misery to our planet?
translation.ja: なぜ 惑星をこんなことに？

translation.en: -You're supposed to be running it. -"You're supposed to be running it."
translation.ja: 送電係だったはず ああ　そうだよ

translation.en: I am running it. Right into the ground.
translation.ja: だから 破壊するのも自由

translation.en: -Those are my orders. -Who ordered that?
translation.ja: 命令なんだ 誰が指示を？

translation.en: No school, no discipline, no rules.
translation.ja: 学校も 教育も 規則もない

translation.en: And most important, no dreams.
translation.ja: 何より 夢もいらない

translation.en: Dreams can destroy you, can't they? My instincts tell me that is so.
translation.ja: 夢は自分を滅ぼすから本能でわかる

translation.en: -Oh, really? -That's why we have to stop you.
translation.ja: 本当か？ だから止めに来たの

translation.en: You and what army?
translation.ja: お前と誰がだって？

translation.en: -Now? -Now.
translation.ja: ヤるか？ ヤるわ

translation.en: Feel the burn.
translation.ja: 燃えなさい

translation.en: Now for reals.
translation.ja: あんまりな

translation.en: Internal radar, shark-like reflexes. You're amazing.
translation.ja: スゴいサメ並みの反射神経だ

translation.en: But is it enough to defeat Mr. Electric?
translation.ja: でもアイツは倒せない

translation.en: We have our secret weapon. Remember?
translation.ja: 秘密兵器があるわ

translation.en: Did you really believe you could stop me?
translation.ja: 私を止められるとでも思ってるのか

translation.en: I know we can't, but he can.
translation.ja: この子にならできるわ

translation.en: Take it away, Max.
translation.ja: やるのよ　マックス

translation.en: Show him what you're made of, Max.
translation.ja: 自分の力を見せて

translation.en: What am I supposed to do?
translation.ja: どうすれば？

translation.en: -I told you this would happen. -I thought he would just remember.
translation.ja: こうなると言った 覚えてるはずよ

translation.en: Remember what?
translation.ja: 何をだよ？

translation.en: The dream. Remember the dream.
translation.ja: 夢よ　思い出して

translation.en: I don't remember half my dreams.
translation.ja: いつも半分しか覚えてない

translation.en: That's why I write them in my dream journal.
translation.ja: だから 夢日記に記録を

translation.en: What half of your dreams do you remember?
translation.ja: 半分って 一体どんなのよ？

translation.en: This part I remember.
translation.ja: これは記憶にある

translation.en: -Where are you taking us? -Where all the useless dreams go.
translation.ja: どこに連れて行く気？ 夢が捨てられる場所

translation.en: To the Dream Graveyard.
translation.ja: 夢の墓場だよ

translation.en: Well, at least we're on the Passage of Time.
translation.ja: たぶん これは夢の回廊だわ

translation.en: -Maybe it'll take us to the Dream Lair. -It's going in the wrong direction.
translation.ja: 夢の巣はどっち？ 方向が違うぞ

translation.en: The Dream Lair's that way.
translation.ja: 夢の巣はあっち

translation.en: What's in the Dream Lair?
translation.ja: そこには何が？

translation.en: It's where all the dreams that fuel Planet Drool are stored.
translation.ja: 惑星を動かす夢があるけど―

translation.en: But they're being destroyed.
translation.ja: 壊れかけてるの

translation.en: -How? -That's what we have to find out.
translation.ja: 原因は？ 調査しないとね

translation.en: Soon even Sharkboy and I will cease to exist.
translation.ja: 私達の存在が消える前に

translation.en: Duck.
translation.ja: 伏せろ！

translation.en: Max, where is your dream journal?
translation.ja: 夢日記は一体どこにあるんだ？

translation.en: Great thinking, Sharkie.
translation.ja: いい考えね

translation.en: We can read his dreams out loud...
translation.ja: 日記を読めば―

translation.en: ...and turn everything back to the way it was.
translation.ja: 全部元とおりになるわ

translation.en: I may even realize my true identity.
translation.ja: 自分の本当の正体もわかるかも

translation.en: I threw it away.
translation.ja: 捨てちゃった

translation.en: My journal's back on Earth.
translation.ja: 日記は地球にある

translation.en: We really thought you were the answer, Max.
translation.ja: 君が救世主だと思ってた

translation.en: Don't listen to him.
translation.ja: 気にしないで

translation.en: He's upset because you didn't show up and make him King of the Ocean...
translation.ja: あなたがいれば魚の大軍を従えて―

translation.en: ...with a giant fish army to back him up.
translation.ja: 海の王になれるかと

translation.en: Look who's talking.
translation.ja: お前だって

translation.en: You thought you'd find a great use for your powers and heal the planet.
translation.ja: パワーの使い道を知りたがってた

translation.en: Max thought his dream world would be a happy place.
translation.ja: これが幸せな夢の世界？

translation.en: We've all been duped.
translation.ja: まんまとだまされた

translation.en: I think you broke my fin.
translation.ja: ヒレが折れてる

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: Hey, you. I see you hiding.
translation.ja: おい　隠れてもムダだぞ

translation.en: Come back here.
translation.ja: 戻って来い

translation.en: I was awakened.
translation.ja: 起こされた

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.ja: すみません

translation.en: Did all the children from Mount Neverest escape?
translation.ja: 子供達は山から逃げたのか？

translation.en: With Sharkboy and Lavagirl. But I took care of it. See?
translation.ja: シャークボーイ達のしわざだ私が始末を

translation.en: Someone was with them?
translation.ja: 他に誰がいる？

translation.en: Just another child afraid of his own shadow. No threat to us.
translation.ja: 臆病な子供が一人何の力もない

translation.en: I banished him to the Dream Graveyard.
translation.ja: 夢の墓場に追放しました

translation.en: Where old dreams lie? He could find an ally.
translation.ja: 古い夢が眠る場所か仲間を見つけるぞ

translation.en: I told you, every dream must be smashed...
translation.ja: すべての夢は破壊しなければ

translation.en: ...every child captured.
translation.ja: 子供が描く夢全部

translation.en: If you want him back, I'll simply track him when he falls asleep.
translation.ja: ヤツが眠ったら追跡します

translation.en: Fool. He's the Daydreamer...
translation.ja: バカめ白昼夢を見られる子だぞ

translation.en: ...and the moment he realizes it will be the moment of our doom.
translation.ja: それに気付かれれば我々の運命は終わる

translation.en: Now what do you want me to do?
translation.ja: では どうすれば？

translation.en: Bring me the boy before he discovers his true powers...
translation.ja: 少年を連れ戻せ真の力を見つけて―

translation.en: ...and tears my new kingdom apart.
translation.ja: 私の王国を破壊する前に

translation.en: Plugs, redirect the Darkness.
translation.ja: プラグよ　闇を再び召喚せよ

translation.en: And...
translation.ja: そして…

translation.en: ...bring me the Plug Hounds.
translation.ja: コンセント犬を連れて来い

translation.en: We'll never find our way out of this graveyard.
translation.ja: 墓場の出口が見つからない

translation.en: Darkness headed this way.
translation.ja: 闇はあっちへ向かった

translation.en: Sit down, Max.
translation.ja: 座って

translation.en: -What for? -Close your eyes and dream.
translation.ja: なんで？ 目を閉じて夢見るの

translation.en: If Max can't remember his dreams, maybe he can re-dream them.
translation.ja: 夢を思い出せないならもう一度見ればいい

translation.en: -He could dream us out of here. -Dream, Max.
translation.ja: ここから思い出せるかも 夢を見て

translation.en: Now, what do you see?
translation.ja: さあ　何かわかる？

translation.en: I see a giant...
translation.ja: 巨大な…

translation.en: ...chocolate-chunk marshmallow cookie...
translation.ja: チョコ入りのマシュマロクッキー…

translation.en: ...with lots of warm milk.
translation.ja: 温めたミルクも

translation.en: -Sorry, I'm starving. -Here's some food.
translation.ja: お腹ペコペコで 食べ物あるわ

translation.en: -You're not gonna like that. -I'm so hungry, I could eat lava rocks.
translation.ja: 気に入るかしら マグマでも食べるよ

translation.en: -What is that? -Lava rocks.
translation.ja: なにこれ？ マグマよ

translation.en: Here, have some real food. Fresh sushi.
translation.ja: こっちは本物の寿司だ

translation.en: -It'll knock you right out. -That's not fresh.
translation.ja: マジでうまいぞ 腐ってる

translation.en: -I'm not sure that's sushi anymore. -Just a few weeks old.
translation.ja: 本当に寿司なの ほんの数週間前のだ

translation.en: I'll cook it for you.
translation.ja: 料理してあげる

translation.en: That's okay. I'm not that hungry anymore.
translation.ja: いいよもう食欲ない

translation.en: Let me just rest a moment. Maybe I can sleep.
translation.ja: 休憩しよう少し眠るよ

translation.en: It's getting closer.
translation.ja: 近くに来てるぞ

translation.en: Get out of here.
translation.ja: 出ていけ

translation.en: Max, I know you got a lot to figure out...
translation.ja: ねえ　疲れてると思うけど―

translation.en: ...but if you happen to dream about who I am and how I fit into this world...
translation.ja: 私の正体が何か夢に見たことがあるなら―

translation.en: -...it would be helpful for me to know. -No distractions.
translation.ja: 教えてほしいの ムダ話はよせ

translation.en: You steer him off-course, we could be lost in a sea of dreams.
translation.ja: 彼の気を削ぐな夢に迷い込むぞ

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm desperate. -Focus on the problem at hand.
translation.ja: 焦ってたの 目の前の問題に集中だ

translation.en: Max needs to dream us out of here, so how about I put him to sleep now?
translation.ja: 夢が必要なら眠らせるのはどうだ？

translation.en: -No, Sharkboy. -One punch, he'll be out like a light.
translation.ja: やめて 一発でぶっ倒れるぞ

translation.en: I've seen this before. It's on the tip of my finger.
translation.ja: これは夢に見たことが僕の指先だ

translation.en: It's a hand.
translation.ja: そう　手だよ

translation.en: It is a hand.
translation.ja: 手なんだ

translation.en: A hand?
translation.ja: 手なら―

translation.en: Another hand.
translation.ja: あっちにも

translation.en: -Yep, it's Tobor! -Who?
translation.ja: そう　トッボロだ！ 誰なの？

translation.en: Tobor. I dreamt him up when I was a kid.
translation.ja: 小さい頃 夢に出てきた

translation.en: A robot that could help me with my homework.
translation.ja: 宿題を手伝ってくれるロボット

translation.en: I tried to build him once.
translation.ja: 作ろうとしてた

translation.en: Everyone kept telling me he would never work.
translation.ja: みんなに動かないと言われて

translation.en: So here he is.
translation.ja: ここにいたんだ

translation.en: A forgotten dream in the Dream Graveyard.
translation.ja: 夢の墓場に忘れられた

translation.en: -Maybe he can help us. -He's supposed to be very smart.
translation.ja: 助けてくれるかも とっても頭が良いんだ

translation.en: -Tobor, awake. -Yes?
translation.ja: トッボロ　起きて 何だい？

translation.en: He works.
translation.ja: 動いてる

translation.en: We could ask him anything now.
translation.ja: これで話せる

translation.en: Let me. Let me. Tell me something about me.
translation.ja: 待って私の事を教えて

translation.en: -I'm clueless. -Actually, you are extremely bright.
translation.ja: 自分がわからない 君は とても明るい子だね

translation.en: -Am I King of the Ocean, or what? -No, sorry.
translation.ja: 俺は海の王なのか？ 違う　残念

translation.en: How do I save Planet Drool?
translation.ja: 惑星を救う方法は？

translation.en: The answer is in your dreams.
translation.ja: 答えは君の夢の中だよ

translation.en: You mean if I put him to sleep, he'll dream us out of this mess?
translation.ja: 眠らせばここから何か思い出せる？

translation.en: No. At least not here.
translation.ja: いや　ここでは無理だ

translation.en: Darkness is falling.
translation.ja: 闇が降りてくる

translation.en: Any dream of his will become a nightmare...
translation.ja: 彼の夢が悪夢に変わる

translation.en: ...and you don't want those becoming a reality.
translation.ja: 現実にしたくないだろう

translation.en: But if you go to the Land of Milk and Cookies...
translation.ja: でもお菓子の大地に行けば―

translation.en: -Of course. -...that's where the good dreams are.
translation.ja: そうよ いい夢を見られる

translation.en: -Where the answers are. -It's perfect, Max.
translation.ja: そこに答えがある 良かったわね

translation.en: The Land of Milk and Cookies is a safe, sweet place.
translation.ja: お菓子の大地なら 安全だわ

translation.en: You'll be able to dream easily there.
translation.ja: すぐに夢を見られる

translation.en: -Can you take us? -I have no body. I can't move.
translation.ja: 連れてって 体がない　動けないよ

translation.en: You can move your eyes and your mouth.
translation.ja: 目と口は動かせる

translation.en: Why didn't you work back on Earth, Tobor?
translation.ja: なぜ地球では動かなかったの？

translation.en: Some dreams are so powerful they become real...
translation.ja: 思いが強く現実になる夢もある

translation.en: ...like Sharkboy and Lavagirl.
translation.ja: シャークボーイ達のように

translation.en: I, on the other hand, am still only a dream.
translation.ja: でも 私はただの夢に過ぎない

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Train of thought, I'm losing it.
translation.ja: 何が違うの？ 思考を見失ってる

translation.en: You were taking us to the Land of Milk and Cookies, remember?
translation.ja: お菓子の大地に行くんでしょ？

translation.en: I mean, I'm literally losing the Train of Thought.
translation.ja: 思考の列車を見失っているんだ

translation.en: -It's down there. -That's the Train of Thought?
translation.ja: 下を走ってた あれが思考の列車？

translation.en: -How do I keep it on track? -With your mind.
translation.ja: 何で僕はあんな物を 君の脳内に

translation.en: The Train of Thought gets easily distracted.
translation.ja: 思考の列車は脱線しやすい

translation.en: Stay focused, and it'll speed you directly...
translation.ja: 集中すれば すぐに着くさ

translation.en: ...to the Land of Milk and Cookies. The rest is up to you.
translation.ja: お菓子の大地にね後は君達次第だ

translation.en: Sorry I forgot about you, Tobor.
translation.ja: 君のこと忘れてて ごめん

translation.en: Are you kidding? You just saved me. I'm free!
translation.ja: いや　君に救われたよ自由になれた！

translation.en: Max, get down here!
translation.ja: マックス　下に降りて！

translation.en: -What's wrong? -We can't control it.
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 運転できない

translation.en: All you have to do is keep it on track.
translation.ja: 線路を走るだけだ

translation.en: How can we keep it on track if there is no track?
translation.ja: 線路がないのにどうやって？

translation.en: Looks like another dream gone bad.
translation.ja: 今度は別の悪夢だ

translation.en: -What do we do? -Yell. Scream.
translation.ja: どうしよう？ 叫んで わめく

translation.en: Jump! It'll be all right.
translation.ja: 飛び降りるわよ！

translation.en: What does it mean when your Train of Thought wrecks?
translation.ja: 思考の列車が脱線ってこういうこと？

translation.en: Well...
translation.ja: それは…

translation.en: ...can't be good, buddy.
translation.ja: 大変だな

translation.en: How much time do we have, Sharkboy?
translation.ja: あと 何分残ってるの？

translation.en: Twenty minutes.
translation.ja: 20分だな

translation.en: Stick to rotten fish, please.
translation.ja: 腐った魚の方がマシ

translation.en: Chocolate. I stepped in chocolate.
translation.ja: チョコだチョコの沼に嵌(は)まった

translation.en: We're here.
translation.ja: 着いたわ

translation.en: The Land of Milk and Cookies.
translation.ja: お菓子の大地だ

translation.en: The milk is warm.
translation.ja: ミルクが温かい

translation.en: -He'll be out in no time. -Lay down.
translation.ja: すぐに眠れるだろ 横になって

translation.en: Here's a marshmallow pillow.
translation.ja: マシュマロ枕よ

translation.en: How about dreaming us into the Dream Lair?
translation.ja: 夢の棲み家を思い出して

translation.en: The ground is thumping too much.
translation.ja: 地面がゴロゴロ言ってる

translation.en: My highly trained ears hear it too.
translation.ja: 俺の耳にも聞こえる

translation.en: Boom, boom, boom.
translation.ja: ボンボンってな

translation.en: -Let me hear it. -I wouldn't.
translation.ja: 聞きたい 無理だろ

translation.en: Hothead.
translation.ja: アツアツだ

translation.en: When you dreamt up these giant cookies...
translation.ja: こんな巨大クッキーなんて―

translation.en: ...who did you expect to be able to eat them?
translation.ja: 誰が食べると思ってるの？

translation.en: I really didn't think about it.
translation.ja: よく考えてなかった

translation.en: Because if you dream giant cookies...
translation.ja: 巨大クッキーがあれば―

translation.en: ...something has to be created to consume giant cookies.
translation.ja: それを食べる人もいるはずよ

translation.en: Cookie giants!
translation.ja: クッキージャイアント！

translation.en: Frosting.
translation.ja: 粉砂糖だ

translation.en: Those giants almost looked like my parents.
translation.ja: あの巨人 僕の両親に似てる

translation.en: They seem happy together. Is that your dream?
translation.ja: 仲良しねこれもあなたの夢？

translation.en: We had a dream of family. It hasn't been coming true lately.
translation.ja: 私達も家族の夢を見るわ最近叶わないけど

translation.en: Most dreams don't come true on their own.
translation.ja: たいていの夢は叶わない

translation.en: You have to make them true.
translation.ja: 自分で叶えなきゃ

translation.en: Takes a lot of work. Not easy.
translation.ja: 大変なことよ　簡単ではない

translation.en: But not impossible either.
translation.ja: でも不可能じゃない

translation.en: Stinking fresh air. Blinding sunlight.
translation.ja: むせるような空気目が眩む太陽の光

translation.en: Oh, how I long for a sky with fluorescent lights.
translation.ja: こんな空を どれだけ待ち望んでいたことか

translation.en: Stand back.
translation.ja: 下がるんだ

translation.en: All right, that one was me.
translation.ja: 役立たずめ

translation.en: Still empty-handed, I see.
translation.ja: まだ見つけてないのか？

translation.en: -You're so powerful, you find him. -That's your job.
translation.ja: ご自分で捜した方が お前の仕事だ

translation.en: Do it, or I'll have you discharged.
translation.ja: 充電切れになりたいか

translation.en: Someone is dreaming in here.
translation.ja: 誰かが夢を見始めた

translation.en: All right, Max. You've had your cookies and milk, now go to sleep.
translation.ja: よし　お菓子を食ったから眠っていいぞ

translation.en: I'll try.
translation.ja: やってみる

translation.en: -Go to sleep. -Not like that. Sing him a lullaby.
translation.ja: 眠るんだ 乱暴だわ　子守歌を歌って

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: Your turn.
translation.ja: 交代ね

translation.en: Close your eyes, shut your mouth Dream a dream and get us out
translation.ja: 目を閉じて 夢を見よ俺達を助けろ

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: Hit the hay, fast asleep Dream a dream, you little bleep
translation.ja: 眠れ　眠れ夢の世界へ飛んでいけ

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: It's working! Keep it up, Sharkboy!
translation.ja: 効いてる！続けるのよ

translation.en: Just relax, lay about Or my fist will put you out
translation.ja: リラックスだ俺の拳で眠りたいか

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream, Dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: Take your time, but beware There is Darkness in the air
translation.ja: 焦るな　でも気をつけろ闇が迫ってる

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream Dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: Dream about me next, Max. I need to know who I am.
translation.ja: 次は私の夢を自分の正体を知りたいの

translation.en: Not just destruction or a simple flame.
translation.ja: 私はただ物を焼き尽くす存在？

translation.en: Dream of me as something good.
translation.ja: 私のいい夢を見て

translation.en: Don't despair, step right up Glass of water, here's a cup
translation.ja: 落ち着け　前を見ろ水でもかぶれ

translation.en: Dream, dream, dream Dream, dream, dream
translation.ja: おやすみ　おやすみいい夢を

translation.en: He's having a nightmare. Wake up, Max! Wake up!
translation.ja: 悪夢を見てる目を覚まして

translation.en: Stop that racket, Sharkboy. You're giving him nightmares!
translation.ja: 歌をやめて悪夢を見せてるわ

translation.en: Sorry, Max.
translation.ja: マックス　ごめん

translation.en: -What was that for? -Your nightmare was about me...
translation.ja: 何だよ？ 私の悪夢を見てた

translation.en: ...wasn't it?
translation.ja: そうなの？

translation.en: I don't remember.
translation.ja: 覚えてないよ

translation.en: But I did dream about one thing.
translation.ja: でも一つだけ夢を見た

translation.en: Plug Hounds!
translation.ja: コンセント犬だ！

translation.en: This may come as a shock to you.
translation.ja: ビリビリ来るかもな

translation.en: Feel the power!
translation.ja: 力にひれ伏すんだ！

translation.en: It's empty.
translation.ja: 燃料切れだ

translation.en: Fudge.
translation.ja: キャラメルか

translation.en: -I forgot to dream of gas. -Max!
translation.ja: ガソリンを忘れてた バカだな！

translation.en: My powers are weakening.
translation.ja: 力が弱まってる

translation.en: Watch the power lines, very dangerous.
translation.ja: コードに気をつけろ危険だぞ

translation.en: -Sharkboy, get me down from here! -Can't you see I'm busy?
translation.ja: 助けて　シャークボーイ！ 今 取り込み中だ

translation.en: Hot lava. Hot lava.
translation.ja: マグマよ　力を

translation.en: -I don't got much fight left in me, Max. -Where's Lavagirl?
translation.ja: あまり力が残ってない マグマガールは？

translation.en: It's up to you now, Max. Dream us out of here.
translation.ja: 今よ　マックスここを脱出する夢を

translation.en: We believe in you, Max.
translation.ja: あなたを信じてる

translation.en: Shark Boat with turbo boosters. Shark Boat with turbo boosters!
translation.ja: ターボエンジン付きのサメ型ボート！

translation.en: A banana split?
translation.ja: バナナかよ

translation.en: Still hungry, Max? How about a knuckle sandwich?
translation.ja: 腹ペコなら拳(こぶし)でも食らうか

translation.en: No, look.
translation.ja: 違うわ　見て

translation.en: It's a banana split boat.
translation.ja: バナナボートよ

translation.en: Then let's split!
translation.ja: 乗り込むぞ！

translation.en: Catch you later.
translation.ja: また後でな

translation.en: All dreamers must dream.
translation.ja: 夢想家なら また夢を見る

translation.en: This is great, Max. You're starting to daydream.
translation.ja: スゴイわ白昼夢も見られるように

translation.en: Keep that up and they'll never get us.
translation.ja: その調子よ彼らを巻けるわ

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ja: そうだね

translation.en: Learn to dream with your eyes open...
translation.ja: コツをつかむのよ

translation.en: ...then you won't have to be asleep to dream.
translation.ja: 眠らなくても夢を見れる

translation.en: You'll be able to make anything happen at any time.
translation.ja: 何だって起こせるわいつでもね

translation.en: Row, row, row Your banana split boat
translation.ja: 舵を取れ バナナボードよ

translation.en: Gently down The Stream of Consciousness
translation.ja: ゆっくりと意識の河へ

translation.en: Merrily, merrily, merrily, merrily Life is Max's dream
translation.ja: 愉快さ人生は彼の夢の中

translation.en: Sugar will give you nightmares.
translation.ja: 砂糖は悪夢のもとだ

translation.en: -How much time do we have? -Don't ask.
translation.ja: あと時間はどれくらい？ 聞くな

translation.en: The Dream Lair's across the Ocean of Ice.
translation.ja: 夢の巣は海の向こうだ

translation.en: We'll have to travel there by foot.
translation.ja: 凍った海を歩くぞ

translation.en: What was it you saw in your dream, Max?
translation.ja: 夢では何を見たの？

translation.en: I saw an object shaped like....
translation.ja: ある物を見たんだこんな形で…

translation.en: Give me something to draw with.
translation.ja: 何か描く物を貸して

translation.en: The Crystal Heart.
translation.ja: クリスタルハートだ

translation.en: That's the treasure of the Land of Ice, in the Ice Castle.
translation.ja: 氷の城にある氷の国のお宝だよ

translation.en: It can freeze anything, even time.
translation.ja: 何でも凍らせるんだ時間さえも

translation.en: I've always dreamt of freezing a moment in time.
translation.ja: ずっとそんな物を夢見てた

translation.en: And the Ice Castle's ruled by the Ice Princess.
translation.ja: 氷の城は王女が支配してる

translation.en: I hear she's the most beautiful girl on the planet.
translation.ja: 惑星で一番美人らしい

translation.en: She is not! She's cold and cruel and cares for nobody but herself.
translation.ja: 冷酷で自分のことしか頭にない女よ

translation.en: She's just saying that, Max.
translation.ja: 言わせておけ

translation.en: -You met her? -No, but I know we don't get along.
translation.ja: 会ったの？ いいえ でもわかるの

translation.en: -How do you know that? -I'm fire, she's ice.
translation.ja: 何でわかるんだ？ 私は炎　彼女は氷よ

translation.en: -We must be enemies. -We need that Crystal Heart.
translation.ja: 敵同士になる クリスタルが必要だ

translation.en: But I need you both to get it.
translation.ja: 君達の協力がいる

translation.en: I just hope this isn't a trap.
translation.ja: 本気なら仕方ない

translation.en: If we freeze time with the Crystal Heart...
translation.ja: 時間を止められたら―

translation.en: ...we'll be able to make it to the Dream Lair and save the planet.
translation.ja: 夢の巣に行って惑星を救える

translation.en: That's the plan.
translation.ja: そのとおりだ

translation.en: Behold the Ice Castle. Home to the princess of the Land of Ice.
translation.ja: 見ろ！氷の王女の住んでる城だ

translation.en: -The Crystal Heart's inside the castle? -So they say.
translation.ja: 中にクリスタルハートが？ うわさでは

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: It's no use. I'll melt the bridge.
translation.ja: ダメ　橋を溶かしちゃう

translation.en: This place inflames me.
translation.ja: 私の炎をかき立てる

translation.en: Can you cool down enough to get across?
translation.ja: 落ち着いたら渡れる？

translation.en: I'd have to be asleep to do that.
translation.ja: 寝たらできそう

translation.en: Can you try sleepwalking?
translation.ja: 眠りながら歩ける？

translation.en: My dream is to live on Earth, but someplace warm.
translation.ja: 私の夢は 地球上の暖かい場所に住むこと

translation.en: And that Earth will accept me. Even if I...
translation.ja: 地球なら私を受け入れてくれる　たとえ…

translation.en: ...destroy everything I touch.
translation.ja: 触れる物すべてを破壊しても

translation.en: No, Lavagirl! Don't sneeze!
translation.ja: ダメだ　マグマガールくしゃみをするな！

translation.en: Look.
translation.ja: 見てよ

translation.en: She's sleeping.
translation.ja: 彼女眠ってる

translation.en: They found us again. Lavagirl!
translation.ja: ヤツらに見つかったぞ！

translation.en: If you wake her up, she'll reheat.
translation.ja: 起こしたら また燃えるぞ

translation.en: She can make it.
translation.ja: 彼女ならやれる

translation.en: Lavagirl, they're behind you!
translation.ja: ヤツらが後ろにいるぞ！

translation.en: Let's go. Hurry!
translation.ja: ほら　急いで！

translation.en: It's a trap!
translation.ja: これはワナよ！

translation.en: You can almost feel the electricity in the air, can't you?
translation.ja: 空気が帯電してたろ？違うか？

translation.en: This is all wrong. Someone else's dreams are in here.
translation.ja: こんなの違う誰かの夢が混ざってる

translation.en: Lights out.
translation.ja: 一寸先は闇ってな

translation.en: Welcome to the Dream Lair.
translation.ja: 夢の巣へようこそ

translation.en: I am the ruler of Planet Drool.
translation.ja: よだれ惑星の支配者だ

translation.en: No, you're not. Max is.
translation.ja: 違う　それはマックスよ

translation.en: Max may have dreamed it originally...
translation.ja: ここの創始者はマックスだ

translation.en: ...but I made it much cooler.
translation.ja: でも俺様の夢の方が…クールだ

translation.en: I am Minus.
translation.ja: 俺こそがマイナス

translation.en: -How'd you get so powerful? -I do a lot of reading.
translation.ja: どこでそんな力を？ 読んだだけさ

translation.en: My book of dreams.
translation.ja: 僕の夢日記

translation.en: That's why everything is so messed up. He's changing it.
translation.ja: だから 滅茶苦茶なんだ書き換えられた

translation.en: Electric eels.
translation.ja: エレキうなぎよ

translation.en: Shocking, isn't it, Sharkboy?
translation.ja: ビリビリくるだろ？

translation.en: Reminds me of the time that electrical storm...
translation.ja: あの雷雨の日を思い出すよ

translation.en: ...blew apart your father's laboratory.
translation.ja: お前の父親の研究所がやられた日

translation.en: -Where is my father? -Let's see.
translation.ja: 父さんはどこだ？ そうだな

translation.en: Check the bottom of the ocean.
translation.ja: 海の底にいるかも

translation.en: And Lavagirl.
translation.ja: それから マグマガール

translation.en: Once I figure out how to freeze this planet's core...
translation.ja: 惑星の核を凍らせたら―

translation.en: ...all of your powers will disappear.
translation.ja: 君の力は消え失せる

translation.en: Powers? What powers?
translation.ja: 力？　何のこと？

translation.en: And last but least, Max.
translation.ja: 最後にお前だな　マックス

translation.en: You thought you could escape fear by running away to Dreamland...
translation.ja: 夢の世界へ逃げてきても―

translation.en: ...but fear exists in the one place you can never escape.
translation.ja: 無駄だったな恐怖はお前の…

translation.en: Your mind.
translation.ja: 頭の中にある

translation.en: I will show you the true meaning of fear.
translation.ja: 本当の恐怖を教えよう

translation.en: When Darkness falls, the rest of your dreams will be destroyed...
translation.ja: 闇が訪れればお前の夢は消え―

translation.en: ...and I will rule Planet Drool.
translation.ja: 俺様が惑星を支配する

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah...
translation.ja: そんな感じさ

translation.en: ...threat, threat, threat.
translation.ja: おっかない

translation.en: You must all leave now. I have some dreaming to do.
translation.ja: 全員消えたまえ夢の続きを見なければ

translation.en: If I could just get my dream journal...
translation.ja: 夢日記さえ取り戻せば―

translation.en: ...I could turn everything back to the way it was.
translation.ja: すべて元通りにできるのに

translation.en: My fire's dimming.
translation.ja: 炎が消えそうだわ

translation.en: -I can't melt the bars. -My strength is failing me as well.
translation.ja: カゴを溶かせない 俺の力も衰えてる

translation.en: How much time do we have, Sharkboy?
translation.ja: あと残り時間は？

translation.en: Who cares? We're never getting out of here.
translation.ja: もういいだろどうせ 出られないさ

translation.en: La La's.
translation.ja: ララの歌よ

translation.en: They like you.
translation.ja: なつかれてる

translation.en: -I don't feel destructive right now. -I do!
translation.ja: 落ち込んじゃいれないわ 俺もだ！

translation.en: This song is driving me crazy.
translation.ja: 頭がおかしくなる！

translation.en: Don't worry about him. He's a cold fish.
translation.ja: 気にしないで冷たいの

translation.en: I'm serious.
translation.ja: マジでやめろ！

translation.en: They're singing at a frequency...
translation.ja: コイツらの歌の周波数が…

translation.en: ...my highly trained ears find disturbing!
translation.ja: 俺の鍛えられた耳には耳障りなんだ！

translation.en: Sing louder. Sing higher.
translation.ja: もっと大きく高い声で

translation.en: You don't want to be too close to him when he explodes.
translation.ja: 爆発するから近寄らないで

translation.en: Shark frenzy!
translation.ja: 解き放って！

translation.en: Nice job channeling your anger, Sharkie.
translation.ja: いい爆発だったわ

translation.en: First things first, transportation out of here.
translation.ja: まずは 空間を移動しよう

translation.en: My dreams.
translation.ja: 僕の夢だ

translation.en: -Lavagirl, you have a Lava Bike. -I do?
translation.ja: マグマバイクがあるはずだ そうなの？

translation.en: I do!
translation.ja: あった！

translation.en: -This is so exciting. -Cool it, Lavagirl.
translation.ja: ワクワクするわね 落ち着けよ

translation.en: Everything we need is right here in this book.
translation.ja: 必要な物は 全部日記の中に

translation.en: Sharkboy...
translation.ja: シャークボーイ…

translation.en: ...your father really is at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.ja: 君の父親は本当に海の底に

translation.en: He's in a submarine...
translation.ja: 海水艇の中にいる

translation.en: ...looking for you.
translation.ja: 君を探してるよ

translation.en: He's over the hydrothermal vents, Mid-Atlantic Ridge...
translation.ja: 大西洋の中央海嶺(かいれい)の上だ

translation.en: ...42 degrees west by 14 north.
translation.ja: 西経42度　北緯14度

translation.en: Depth, 1800 meters. Near Snake Pit.
translation.ja: 水深1800メートルヘビ穴の近く

translation.en: -I need to get back to Earth. -What's it say about me?
translation.ja: 地球に戻らないと 私のことは？

translation.en: -I'm not sure what this is. -I can figure it out.
translation.ja: どれかわからない 自分で見るわ

translation.en: Maybe there's a section on my true identity.
translation.ja: どこかにページが

translation.en: Lavagirl, no!
translation.ja: 触っちゃダメだ

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: -What have I done? -That's terrific, LG.
translation.ja: 何をしたの？ サイアクだな

translation.en: It's okay, Lavagirl.
translation.ja: もういいよ

translation.en: It was an accident.
translation.ja: 事故だったから

translation.ja: 手を離すな 私と離れたいのかと

translation.en: No, I don't. You're my best friend.
translation.ja: 何言うんだ君は僕の親友だろ

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してるわ

translation.en: I love you too.
translation.ja: 僕も愛してる

translation.en: Come back!
translation.ja: 戻って来てくれ

translation.en: Please, come back.
translation.ja: お願いだ　妻を返して

translation.en: I'm not going anywhere.
translation.ja: どこにも行かないわ

translation.en: Neither am I.
translation.ja: 僕もだよ

translation.en: Okay, class, I'm just a teacher...
translation.ja: いいか　私はただの教師で―

translation.en: ...and I'm here to inspire the answers from you.
translation.ja: 君達の答えを導くのが役目だ

translation.en: And I think that's some pretty good inspiration outside.
translation.ja: そして今 いい課題例がある

translation.en: So this is now a pop quiz.
translation.ja: ここでクイズだ

translation.en: We need to defeat that guy.
translation.ja: みんなで倒そう

translation.en: Any ideas?
translation.ja: 何かアイデアは？

translation.en: Wow, Linus, you get a plus for being the first hand in the air.
translation.ja: 挙手が速いプラス評価だ

translation.en: I can take him.
translation.ja: 俺が捕まえる

translation.en: Linus, watch out!
translation.ja: 気をつけろ！

translation.en: Nice try.
translation.ja: よくやった

translation.en: Sorry, Max.
translation.ja: すまない

translation.en: -Your journal. -It's okay.
translation.ja: 君の日記が 平気だよ

translation.en: It was an accident. Plenty more dreams where those came from.
translation.ja: 夢はもっとたくさん見れるから

translation.en: Okay, kids, who's next? Remember, there are no dumb ideas.
translation.ja: 次は誰だ？くだらん意見はナシだ

translation.en: Maybe we can freeze his circuits.
translation.ja: 回路を凍らせよう

translation.en: That's the dumbest idea I've ever heard.
translation.ja: 最高にくだらんな

translation.en: We're in the middle of Texas in August.
translation.ja: 真夏のテキサスだぞ

translation.en: -Next idea. Please, anyone but Linus. -Wait, that's a great idea.
translation.ja: 誰か別の意見を 待って　それがいい

translation.en: Thanks, Linus.
translation.ja: ありがとう　ライナス

translation.en: Come here, Marissa.
translation.ja: こっちだ　マリッサ

translation.en: Is this yours?
translation.ja: 君のだね？

translation.en: How'd you find it?
translation.ja: 一体どこで？

translation.en: So you've seen this?
translation.ja: 見たことあるの？

translation.en: Yes, but only in a dream.
translation.ja: ええ　でも夢の中でよ

translation.en: It can freeze anything.
translation.ja: 何でも凍らせる

translation.en: -Even time. -What are you doing?
translation.ja: 時間でも 何をしてる？

translation.en: You're not sending my daughter out there.
translation.ja: 娘はダメだぞ

translation.en: Let her out.
translation.ja: そのとおり

translation.en: Electrical storm, headed your way.
translation.ja: 雷雨にしてやるぞ！

translation.en: -Do you know what to do? -I believe so.
translation.ja: やり方知ってる？ たぶんね

translation.en: Stand back.
translation.ja: 下がって

translation.en: Well, what do we have here?
translation.ja: さあ　どうする気だ？

translation.en: Get ready for the "megahertz."
translation.ja: メガヘルツはメガ痛いぞ！

translation.en: -Get it? Hertz? -Mega what?
translation.ja: わかったか？ メガなんて？

translation.en: As in the unit of electrical frequency?
translation.ja: 周波数の単位のことさ

translation.en: Wow, you just aren't paying attention in class, are you?
translation.ja: 授業を聞いていないな

translation.en: He's unplugged.
translation.ja: プラグが抜けたな

translation.en: It's snowing out!
translation.ja: 雪が降ってる！

translation.en: You made me a great teacher today.
translation.ja: 君のおかげで学んだ

translation.en: How did I do that?
translation.ja: 僕のおかげ？

translation.en: A great teacher learns as much from his students...
translation.ja: 偉大な教師は生徒から学ぶ

translation.en: ...as they do from him.
translation.ja: 彼らと同じ姿勢で

translation.en: You have...
translation.ja: 君は私の―

translation.en: ...awakened me.
translation.ja: 目を覚ました

translation.en: Thank you, Max.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Max...
translation.ja: マックス

translation.en: ...your report, please.
translation.ja: 発表を頼む

translation.en: The following story is true.
translation.ja: この物話は真実です

translation.en: It might have started as a dream.
translation.ja: 始まりは夢だった

translation.en: But as we saw yesterday...
translation.ja: でも昨日のように―

translation.en: ...when we make our dreams a reality...
translation.ja: 夢は現実にできる 「ミスターポジティブ」

translation.en: ...reality becomes a dream.
translation.ja: 現実は夢を創り出す

translation.en: Sharkboy lives his dream as King of the Ocean...
translation.ja: シャークボーイは海の王に

translation.en: ...where he cares for all its creatures.
translation.ja: 海洋生物を治めてる

translation.en: He searches for his father's submarine where there is no light...
translation.ja: 暗闇のなか父親の海水艇を探しながら

translation.en: ...except in one place...
translation.ja: でも１か所だけ―

translation.en: ...where light shines almost as bright as the sun.
translation.ja: 太陽の光ほどまばゆい場所が

translation.en: It's where Lavagirl lives her dream...
translation.ja: そこではマグマガールが―

translation.en: ...as queen of Earth's volcanoes that boil at the bottom of the sea.
translation.ja: 火山群の女王として君臨し海底を沸かすほどの―

translation.en: A force of life for all living things.
translation.ja: すべての生命の源に

translation.en: Sharkboy and Lavagirl don't visit me anymore.
translation.ja: あれから２人には会ってない

translation.en: But I can visit them, in my dreams.
translation.ja: でも 夢の中で会いに行ける

translation.en: So dream a better dream...
translation.ja: もっといい夢を見よう

translation.en: ...then work to make it real.
translation.ja: 自分の力で叶えるために

translation.en: Yes?
translation.ja: 何だい？
